name: The War In Space
description:
Space shooter with a lot of powerups and enemies!

You have to hold out for 10 waves to win.

Destroy asteroids and enemy ships.
In the game you will find a large number of bonuses, as well as pleasant music :D

Control
Space or Numb0   -  Shoot
W,A,S,D or Arrow - Move

Esc  - Pause
F1   - Music On/Off
F2   - Full screen On/Off
